StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOrgUnitByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgUnitID int )
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [PSROrgUnitID] AS OrgUnitID, [ParentOrgUnit], [PSROrgUnitTypeID] AS OrgUnitTypeID, [Descrip.on] FROM [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] WHERE [PSROrgUnitID] = @OrgUnitID
